definition: the activity of exerting your muscles in various ways to keep fit, do physical exercise
details:
noun
- the activity of exerting your muscles in various ways to keep fit
= example: the activity of exerting your muscles in various ways to keep fit
= synonyms: exercising, physical exercise, physical exertion, workout
- a task performed or problem solved in order to develop skill or understanding
= synonyms: example
- systematic training by multiple repetitions
= synonyms: practice
- the act of using
= synonyms: use
- (usually plural) a ceremony that involves processions and speeches
= example: (usually plural) a ceremony that involves processions and speeches
verb
- do physical exercise
= synonyms: work out
- give a workout to
= example: give a workout to
= synonyms: work
- learn by repetition
= synonyms: practice
- put to use
= synonyms: employed, utilized, utilised, exert
- carry out or practice
= synonyms: practice
